# TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.BadgeProperties

**Structure**

Properties that affect the media item content badge.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BadgeProperties
```

## Creating a Default Configuration

- **default()**: Creates the default configuration for a badge.
- **liveContent()**: Creates the default configuration for a badge representing live content.

## Customizing Content

- **font**: The font for the badge text.
- **color**: The color of the badge text.
- **backgroundColor**: The background tint color of the badge.
- **transform**: The transform to apply to the text before displaying it.
- **TVMediaItemContentConfiguration.TextProperties.TextTransform**: Constants that specify the transform to apply to the text.

## Customizing Content

- **image**: The image to display.
- **text**: The primary text.
- **secondaryText**: The secondary text.
- **badgeText**: The text to display in a badge in the top corner of the content.
- **badgeProperties**: Properties for configuring the badge.
- **overlayView**: An overlay view the system places above the image and automatically resizes to fill the frame.
- **playbackProgress**: The playback progress to display for the media item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
